name: Rich College Couple Makeover
description:
Plunge into the style of Manhattan's elite with one of the best college dress up games for girls with points. The main characters are rich couples trying hard to fit in to the Upper East Side Schools and take their place in the spotlight. Only you can help them become high school fashion queen and king and steal the show. This is the coolest high school crush dress up app for fashion-stylist-to-be.

If you’re looking to dress up a gossip girl and a young billionaire, who look like top models, these fashion games for teenagers are your best bet!

This fabulous rich girl game will give you the opportunity to try yourself as an outfit maker, celebrity stylist, and makeup artist. Create unforgettable looks for privileged upper-class teenagers having unlimited access to the posh boutique with a large number of clothes, shoes, accessories, and cosmetics. These college couples always get what they want: expensive jewelry, plum new dresses and tuxedos, trendy boots, and designer handbags. Now, it’s all yours. Dress the it girl for the day at school or for some special occasion like fashion party, then decide what her boyfriend should wear. If you’ve never tried high school couple makeover, it’s high time to show what you are capable of as a fashion stylist.

Choose the superb outfits for a lady and her gentleman, little liars, devious shamers, fashion divas, gossipers, drama queens, best friends, and rivals. Set the best background. Finally, press the “Camera” button and you’ll get a chic couple picture, which you can share with your bffs.

What so special about this college couple dress up and makeup game?

• Earn point and win prizes for each couple makeover project
• You can play offline with no WIFI
• Lots of clothes and accessories just like in a fashion boutique
• Change facial features, hair styles, and skin color
• All items are free in one of the best dress up games for teenage girls
• Back to school backgrounds
• Become a fashion guru, better than any beauty stylist

Are you a huge it girl fashion games fan? We have lots of college dress up games for teens, high school crush makeover games for girls, stylist games and doll dress up and makeup games for you.
